sentences.en: For me, it represents a potent adjunct to antidepressant medications and, for some patients, it's something you can take in lieu of pills.
sentences.cn: 对于我，它是一个抗抑郁剂曾用药物的强有力的助手，对一些病人来说，它是能够代替药丸的东西。

Many practicing professionals teach in design as adjunct faculty.

sentences.en: Physical therapy is an important adjunct to drug treatments.

sentences.en: She has served as a principal of a dual language school, an assistant principal at a middle school, and was a member of the adjunct faculty for Northern Illinois University.

sentences.en: Sumres are foreign bodies but a necessary adjunct in surgery.

sentences.en: The word is an adjunct of that verb.

sentences.en: This course will be an important adjunct to the professional training.
